name: Create a Playlist of Your Liked Songs
description:
Can I put some music on? I know a good song! It's called.. hmm.. I forgot. 
I have liked it on Spotify but I can't access my Favorite Songs from your phone.. I wish I had added it to a public playlist.

This Applet got you covered!

This Applet will create a playlist of the songs you like on Spotify. 

Remember to add all your current saved songs to this playlist if you want them to be available too.

Make sure that you make the playlist public so you can access it from your friend's phone.
